name: 傅子恒
objective:
本課程主要的目標為從應用與設計的角度，切入擴增實境產業的各種可能性。從教育應用、設計工具以及擴增實境遊戲設計、擴增實境互動式動畫製作等，進行探討。
The main objective of the program, is taking from the application and design perspective, cut into the possibilities of virtual reality industry. Exploring from the educational applications, design tools and virtual reality games, to virtual reality interactive animation, etc.
schedule:
W01: AR 技術及應用簡介
W02: 新一波的現實、Styly AR
W03: 以嶄新的方式看待世界、Spark AR
W04: 觸覺感受、上台報告 #1
W05: 聽覺和智能耳機、Unity Vuforia Examples、Unity AR Foundation Examples
W06: 故事講述和人類想像力、Real World Object 3D Scan
Meshroom 3D Scan
W07: 虛擬化身與物體、上台報告 #2
W08: 期中考 或 期中報告
W09: 身體即介面、OpenCV with Unity
W10: 創造更多可能性、ManoMotion Hand Tracking
W11: AR Experiment Project (1) - Museum Tour、Story book
W12: AR Experiment Project (2) – AR Terrain, AR Map
W13: AR Experiment Project (3) - AR Games, Car Parking, Shooting
W14: AR Experiment Project (4) - AR Chess Battle
W15: AR Experiment Project (5) - Job Training、Education
W16: Final Project Proposal
W17: Final Project Review and Debug
W18: Final Project Demo
scorePolicy:
作業: 20%
上台報告: 10% 
期中分數: 15%
課堂成績: 25%
期末專案: 30%
=====
Extra Bonus for Group Learning (含班級服務、團隊服務、團隊協作態度): 4%
materials: 擴增人類：科技如何塑造新現實，Helen Papagiannis 著，繁體中文版，Gotop 出版，ISBN: 978-986-476-720-5 (平裝)
remarks: 本課程使用 MS Teams 進行各式遠距教學、線上諮詢、課務聯繫事宜。
